content: I think I'll go with a chronological display. That way, I can show off how my collection has grown over time. Speaking of which, I've been collecting vintage cameras for about three months now, and I've managed to snag some amazing deals. I've got a 1960s-era Yashica MG-1 rangefinder, a 1980s Olympus OM-10 SLR, and a few others. Do you have any tips on how to properly store and maintain my cameras to keep them in good condition?
